The number of claims filed by Floridians: The expert's verdict mentions that "150,000 claims have been filed by Floridians." This aspect verifies the claim that a large number of claims have been made in relation to the oil spill.
Percentage of claims paid: The expert's verdict states that "only 40 percent of them have been paid." This aspect verifies the claim that a significant portion of the claims have been paid out.
Percentage of claims denied: The expert's verdict mentions that "a third of them have been denied." This aspect verifies the claim that a portion of the claims have been denied.
Percentage of claims still under review: The expert's verdict states that "20 percent are still in limbo land." This aspect verifies the claim that a portion of the claims are still under review and have not been resolved yet.
